001package com.github.aecsocket.calibre.core;
002
003import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.Numbers;
004import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.raycast.Boundable;
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.raycast.Raycast;
006import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.scheduler.TaskContext;
007import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector2;
008import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector3;
009import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.polar.Coord3;
010
011import java.util.concurrent.ThreadLocalRandom;
012
013public abstract class Bullet<B extends Boundable, M extends Projectile.Fluid<B>> extends Projectile<B, M> {
014    private final double originalSpeed;
015
016    public Bullet(Raycast<B> raycast, Vector3 position, Vector3 velocity, double gravity, M medium) {
017        super(raycast, position, velocity, gravity, medium);
018        originalSpeed = velocity.length();
019    }
020
021    public double originalSpeed() { return originalSpeed; }
022
023    protected abstract double hardness(B hit);
024    protected abstract double penetration();
025    protected abstract Vector2 penetrationDeflect();
026    protected abstract double deflectThreshold();
027
028    /*@Override
029    protected boolean changeMedium(StepContext ctx, Raycast.Result<B> ray, Raycast.Hit<B> hit, Vector3 position, M oldMedium, M newMedium) {
030        //return super.changeMedium(ctx, ray, hit, position, oldMedium, newMedium);
031        double hardness = hardness(hit.hit());
032        double power = Numbers.clamp01(speed() / originalSpeed);
033        double penetration = penetration() * power;
034        double penMult;
035        if (penetration > 0 && (penMult = 1 - Numbers.clamp01(hardness / (penetration * power))) > 0) {
036            // penetrates
037            Coord3 coord = Coord3.coord3(ctx.speed(), velocity.sphericalYaw(), velocity.sphericalPitch());
038            Vector2 penDeflect = penetrationDeflect();
039            velocity = coord
040                // the weaker the penetration (lower penMult), the more the deflection
041                .yaw(coord.yaw() + ThreadLocalRandom.current().nextGaussian() * (penDeflect.x() / penMult))
042                .pitch(coord.pitch() + ThreadLocalRandom.current().nextGaussian() * (penDeflect.y() * penMult))
043                .cartesian();
044            return true;
045        } else {
046            // try deflect
047            Vector3 normal = hit.normal();
048            double dot = Math.abs(ctx.direction().dot(normal));
049            double deflectMult = 1 - dot / (deflectThreshold() * power);
050            if (deflectMult > 0) {
051                // deflect
052                this.position = position.subtract(ctx.direction().multiply(EPSILON));
053                travelled += ray.distance() - EPSILON;
054                velocity = Vector3.reflect(velocity, normal).multiply(deflectMult);
055            } else {
056                // stuck
057                ctx.task().cancel();
058            }
059            return false;
060        }
061    }*/
062}
